thread.title: Kavanaugh-Led Group Clinches Control of Relativity
thread.title_full: Kavanaugh-Led Group Clinches Control of Relativity - WSJ

author: Tom Corrigan
title: Kavanaugh-Led Group Clinches Control of Relativity
text:
Investors led by Relativity Media LLC’s founder and chief executive, Ryan Kavanaugh, have completed a deal to take control of the Hollywood studio the same week the company announced it completed the sale of its television business to senior lenders.
Mr. Kavanaugh’s investors include supermarket mogul Ron Burkle, Chicago-based investor Joseph Nicholas and Orinda, Calif.-based VII Peaks Capital LLC, court papers show. The group said late Wednesday it had completed transactions allowing it to take control of what remains...
